response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to you, offering unparalleled benefits and features tailored to meet your needs. I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $14,000. This opportunity not only provides you with significant savings but also ensures you receive a premium quality product directly from us. I trust that you will find this offer irresistible and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 14000}
